description:
\c[18]<2倍收割>\c[17]<20%额外命中>\c[0] \c[18]<类普攻>\c[0] 用血魔法凝聚的长枪，
造成\c[18]生命\c[0]属性伤害，累计使用三次后冷却2回合
name: 血色长枪I
note:
<Hide if Learned Skill: 37,38>
<Learn Cost: 4 JP>

<技能类型:类普攻>

<Cooldown Steps: 1>

<Custom HP Cost>
cost += user.mhp/40+user.hp/20;
</Custom HP Cost>

<damage formula>
  value = 1;
  value += user.mat*2;
  value += user.atk/2;
  value -= target.mdf;
  var i = 1;
  i -= user.hp/user.mhp<0.7?(0.7 - user.hp/user.mhp)/3: 0;
  value *= i;
  value *= (user.level*user.mat/2048+2);
  value *= (2 - target.hp/target.mhp);
  value += 20;
  value = Math.floor(value);
</damage formula>

<Before Eval>
  user.addState(228);
 user._speartimes = user._speartimes || 0;
  user._speartimes += 1;
  if(user._speartimes >= 3){
    user._speartimes = 0;
    user.addCooldown(36,+3);
  }
</Before Eval>
<After Eval>
  user.removeState(228);
</After Eval>

<Before Eval>
  this._bsaffective = 0.5;
</Before Eval>

<Custom Show Eval>
  if (user.isStateAffected(30) ||
      user.isStateAffected(31) ) {
    visible = false;
  } else {
    visible = true;
  }
</Custom Show Eval>

description:
薇薇安用自己的血液转化为生命力治愈队友，如果存在\c[18]\it[1]\c[0]的队友，
薇薇安还会随机复苏其中一个，但技能的消耗和冷却会翻倍
name: 鲜血治愈I
note:
<Hide if Learned Skill: 63,64>
<Learn Cost: 6 JP>

<Cooldown: 3>
<Cooldown Steps: 1>

<Custom HP Cost>
cost += user.mhp/50+user.hp/25;
var members = $gameParty.deadMembers();
if (members) {  cost += user.mhp/50+user.hp/25; }
</Custom HP Cost>

<技能类型:技能>

<Before Eval>
  if(target.isStateAffected(1)){
    user.addCooldown(62,+2);
    target.removeState(1);
    target.gainHp(1);
  }
</Before Eval>

<damage Formula>
if(user == target){
  value = user.mhp/50 + user.hp/25;
  value = Math.floor(value);
}
else{
  value = user.mhp/20;
  value += user.mat*(1 + user.mat*user.level/2048);
  value *= (3/4 + user.hp/user.mhp - target.hp/target.mhp);
  value = Math.floor(value);
}
</damage Formula>

<Custom Target Eval>
targets.push(target);
var members = $gameParty.deadMembers();
if (members) {
  var member = members[Math.floor(Math.random()*members.length)];
  targets.push(member);
}
</Custom Target Eval>

description:
被动，寒冷环境下的莉莉更加精神，自动获得\it[146]和
\it[153]
message1: 激活了自身的抗寒能力！
name: 北地之哈
note: <Bypass Cooldown>

name: 狗形态普通攻击
note:
<Bypass Cooldown>
<技能类型:空手普攻>

<Before Eval>
user._agatktimes = user._agatktimes || 0;
if(user.isStateAffected(292) && user._agatktimes > 0){
   user._agatktimes -= 1;
   if(user._agatktimes <= 0){
    user.removeState(292);
   }
  }
</Before  Eval>

<damage formula>
  value = 50;
  if(user.isStateAffected(292) && user._agatktimes > 0){
   value += (user.atk * 2 +user.mat - target.def*0.85);
  }
  else{
   value += (user.atk * 2 +user.mat - target.def);
  }
  value *= (user.level*user.atk/2048+2);
  value *= 0.5+user.level/198;
  if(user.isStateAffected(298)){
    if(user.isLearnedSkill(222)){
      value += 5000;
     }
   else{
      if(user.isLearnedSkill(221)){
        value += 3000;
        }
     else{
       if(user.isLearnedSkill(220)){
          value += 1200;
         }
       else{
         if(user.isLearnedSkill(219)){
           value += 400;
             }
          else{
           value += 75;
           }
         }
       }
     }
   }
 value = Math.floor(value);
</damage formula>


<Post-Damage Eval>
 if(user.isStateAffected(292)){
    var random = Math.round(Math.random() * 10 + 1);
    if(random <= 3){
     user.addState(167);
    }
 }
</Post-Damage  Eval>

description:
\c[17]<10%额外命中>\c[0] 使用利爪抓挠敌人三次并附加\it[255]
和\c[18]20层伤害加深\c[0](最多叠加到99层)，目标\it[255]叠加越高伤害越高
name: 利爪抓挠I
note:
<技能类型:类普攻>

<Before Eval>
  this._bsaffective = 0.4;
</Before Eval>

<Before Eval>
  user.addState(227);
</Before Eval>
<After Eval>
  user.removeState(227);
</After Eval>

<Pre-Damage Eval>
 target._block = target._block || 0;
 target._block -= 20;
 target._block = Math.max(target._block, -99);
 target._block = Math.min(target._block, 99);
 if(target._block == 0){ 
   target.setStateCounter(237, 0);
   target.setStateCounter(238, 0);
   target.removeState(237);
   target.removeState(238); } 
   else{
    if(target._block > 0){
      target.addState(238);
      target.setStateCounter(238, target._block);
    }
    else{
      target.addState(237);
      target.setStateCounter(237, Math.abs(target._block));
    }
   }
</Pre-Damage Eval>

<Hide if Learned Skill: 244,245>

name: 炫焰风华I
note:
<技能类型:类普攻>
<Learn Cost: 4 JP>

<After ATB: 20%>

<Hide if Learned Skill: 335,336>

<Cooldown: 5>
<Cooldown Steps: 1>

<damage formula>
  value = 1;
  value += (user.atk * 2 + user.mat - target.def - target.mdf/2);
  value *= (user.level*user.atk/2048+2);
  value = Math.floor(value);
  value *= (target.isStateAffected(36)?1.2: 1);
</damage formula>

this._times = this._times || 0;

     subject.forceAction(337, this._targetIndex);
     BattleManager.forceAction(subject);
     }
}
</Pre-Damage Eval>

name: 迟滞之环
note:
<Bypass Taunt>
<Cannot Counter>

<Target ATB Eval>
 var i = $gameActors.actor(12)._lastallyid;
 var c = $gameActors.actor(i);
  if(c.mat > target.mat*0.6){
    speed = 1;
  }
  else{
   speed = speed * (Math.min(0.3, 0.6 - c.mat/target.mat));
  }
</Target ATB Eval>

  value *= (2 + user.mat*user.level/2048);
  value += 100;
  var barrier = user.barrierPoints();
  value += barrier/2;
  value = Math.floor(value);
</damage formula>

var barrier = user.barrierPoints();
user.loseBarrier(-barrier);
user.removeState(388);
</After Eval>
